isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - ADJUSTMENTS - WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: To check wiper pattern on the windshield turn wipers on to high speed, make sure wipers do not run off the glass or go below horizontal position to bottom edge of glass. To adjust wiper arm and blade assembly use the following procedure.

note.para: Water sprayed on windshield may help to determine wiper pattern.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 81 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If driver or passenger side windshield wiper arm and blade assemblies need adjustment to get the proper wiper pattern, lift windshield wiper arm and blade assembly (Item 3) off spline by lifting windshield wiper arm slide lever (Item 4) and lift windshield wiper arm and blade assembly off spline.

Position windshield wiper arm and blade assembly (Item 3) at spline with wiper blade horizontal to bottom edge of windshield and lift windshield wiper arm slide lever (Item 4) and push windshield wiper arm and blade assembly down onto spline, windshield wiper arm slide lever will lock windshield wiper arm and blade assembly into place once it is pushed all the way down.
Turn wipers on to high speed and check for proper operation.
